title: Media Factory: Media Generation (Image, Video, Music, Narration)
intro:
Your **hero concept** is only as convincing as the **sensory experience** around it.

In this phase you'll **manufacture** a **mini media kit**â€”hero image, brand jingle, and narrated voice-overâ€”that will power your explainer video, website, investor teaser, and social posts.

By **running** the three generation tracks **in parallel** you can operate like an in-house creative agency, **compressing days of design into minutes**.
estimatedTime: 20 minutes (18 min online creation running in parallel, ~2 min coordination)

fields.label: Visual Style
fields.help: Choose the overall visual approach for your hero image
fields.tooltip: Defines the aesthetic direction for all visual assets. Photoreal works for tangible products, stylized illustration for tech/apps, minimalist for premium brands, and bold/dramatic for disruptive concepts.

fields.label: Perspective
fields.help: Choose the perspective for your hero image
fields.tooltip: Determines the focal emphasis of your hero image. Close-up highlights product details, interaction scene shows usage, lifestyle context demonstrates benefits, abstract/conceptual communicates brand values.

fields.label: Music Genre
fields.placeholder: e.g., Upbeat electronic, Warm acoustic, Corporate cinematic
fields.help: Describe the musical style that matches your brand
fields.tooltip: Sets the emotional tone for your brand jingle and background music. Upbeat electronic suits tech products, warm acoustic works for family brands, corporate cinematic fits B2B services.

fields.label: Voice Persona
fields.help: Choose the voice character for your narration
fields.tooltip: Defines the personality and tone for all spoken content including explainer videos, ads, and voice agents. Should align with your target audience's preferences and brand personality.

fields.label: Featured Statistic
fields.placeholder: Select one jaw-dropping statistic from Section B of Science_Evidence.pdf
fields.help: Choose the most compelling statistic to feature in your narration
fields.tooltip: The most credible, impressive data point from your Phase 3 research that will grab attention and validate your solution. This becomes the hook that opens your narrated content and marketing materials.

promptTemplate:
**PURPOSE**: Create an engaging 60-second voiceover script that introduces our company's solution in a way that builds trust, demonstrates value, and motivates action. This script should work as background narration on our website, over promotional videos, or as standalone audio content.

**SCRIPT REQUIREMENTS:**

Write a 60-second narration introducing **{{phase5.chosen_concept_code_name}}**, our new {{phase1.sector}} solution.

â€¢ Hook potential customers in the first line using this statistic: "{{selected_statistic}}"
â€¢ Weave in this expert pull-quote for credibility: "[Pull-quote from Science_Evidence.pdf]"
â€¢ Describe one key interactive feature and expected benefit in â‰¤ 25 words
â€¢ End with a rousing call to action (<15 words)

Tone: {{voice_persona}} (warm, encouraging, trustworthy).

Output plain text only.

steps.action: Open Sora â†’ Select 'Image' â†’ Choose aspect ratio â†’ Enable '4v' for 4 simultaneous variations
**Prompt Strategy:** Describe your hero image using selected visual style and perspective. Example: 'Photoreal close-up glamour shot of [your product] in premium lighting'
Generate multiple batches â†’ Refine prompts based on results â†’ Test different angles and compositions
Select best variation â†’ Download â†’ Rename to `hero.png` â†’ Save to project folder
**Optional:** Generate conceptual videos for website backgrounds (Sora excels at abstract/conceptual motion graphics)
Open Suno.ai â†’ Click 'Create' in sidebar â†’ **Choose Mode:** 'Simple' for style description OR 'Custom' for specific lyrics
**Strategic Prompting:** Combine your brand adjectives with chosen music genre. Be specific about mood, energy level, and intended use as brand jingle.
Submit prompt â†’ Wait for generation (~2 min) â†’ **Pro Tip:** Free accounts have limited generations, so craft thoughtful prompts
Review all variations â†’ Choose version that best captures brand essence â†’ Download â†’ Rename to `jingle.mp3`
**ChatGPT Phase:** Use the provided prompt template â†’ Input your selected statistic and pull-quote â†’ Generate 60-second script â†’ Review and refine for natural flow
**ElevenLabs Setup:** Access app â†’ Browse 'Instant Speech' â†’ Explore voice library â†’ Match voice to your chosen persona (Friendly parent, Energetic coach, etc.)
Paste finalized script â†’ Generate speech â†’ Preview for quality and tone â†’ Download â†’ Rename to `voiceover.mp3`
**Team Alignment:** Define target audience, primary message, and desired user action. Clarify brand tone using your three brand adjectives.

**Claude Instructions:** Create detailed prompt requesting expert copywriter persona â†’ Specify copy elements needed (headline, sub-headline, body copy, bullet points, call-to-action) â†’ Reference brand adjectives for tone
Open Claude â†’ Upload `Hero_Concept_Detailed_Brief.docx` AND `Science_Evidence.pdf` â†’ Submit comprehensive prompt
Review generated copy for brand alignment â†’ Request revisions if needed â†’ Download final version â†’ Save as `copy.txt`
Open notebooklm.google.com â†’ Create new notebook â†’ Assign descriptive project name
**Content Integration:** Upload `Science_Evidence.pdf` â†’ Add any additional research documents â†’ Allow processing time for AI analysis
Click 'Audio Overview' â†’ Wait for podcast generation (~2-3 minutes) â†’ AI creates conversational discussion format
Access completed audio â†’ Preview for quality â†’ Download â†’ Rename to `podcast.mp3` â†’ Save to project folder
